name: Pixelscape: Oceans
description: Pixelscape: Oceans gives users the tools to sketch and build animated oceanscapes, and then fill them with a number of different sea creatures. Save, share, and download an unlimited amount of custom underwater content. The possibilities are as endless as the seas.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required for Steam Workshop functionality, but not required to play the game.  Additonal disk space needed to export and download additional Pixelscapes.  Compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and 10.

reviews.review_text: This is absolutely beautiful. A wonderful art tool with lovely music and an overall gorgeous aesthetic! I'm still getting used to it, but the controls are quite intuitive and the potential for creativity is great! I'm excited to see what else I can make with this. â™¥

Been having a great time with this art tool/game. It's really relaxing to just mess around in, but has a lot of depth and nuance if you dig deeper. The music also adds to the overall atmosphere the game creates. You can tell a lot of love and effort went in to the crafting of this.    Excited to see additional sea creatures and options down the line, as well as (hopefully) NEW PIXELSCAPES in the future. I'd love a forest one, or perhaps a SPACE edition. :D
